game.name: PAYDAY 2: The OVERKILL B-Sides Soundtrack
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: PAYDAY 2: The OVERKILL B-Sides Soundtrack is the 22nd DLC pack and the third soundtrack for PAYDAY 2. It includes an eclectic collection of tracks composed for trailers, teasers, short movies and websites.
game.shortDescriptionEn: PAYDAY 2: The OVERKILL B-Sides Soundtrack is the 22nd DLC pack and the third soundtrack for PAYDAY 2. It includes an eclectic collection of tracks composed for trailers, teasers, short movies and websites.
